program.name: awstats
program.build: gmake SED="${SB_PATH_SED}" PERL="${SB_VAR_PERL}" \ PREFIX="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}" BASE="${SB_INSTALL_BASE}" \ INSTALL="${SB_PATH_INSTALL}"
program.install: gmake SED="${SB_PATH_SED}" PERL="${SB_VAR_PERL}" \ PREFIX="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}" BASE="${SB_INSTALL_BASE}" \ INSTALL="${SB_PATH_INSTALL}" install

note.para: The awstats_configure.pl tool has been modified so that it will not automatically detect apache's conf file. The user must enter the path to the file when prompted.
The install locations have been changed, the tools reside in the bin directory, for easy access. Similarly, other locations may be different than described in the documentation.
